archimate:Deliverable.name: S&C Vulnerability Management Service Governance functions defined
archimate:Deliverable.documentation:
Governance of Vulnerability Management service defined in terms of Security & Compliance responsibilities. For example policy definitions, on/off-boarding of products/assets, risk monitoring, high critical vulnerability mitigation coordination, costs allocations, service management and continuous improvement
- Policy definitions - On/off-boarding of products / assets - Risk monitoring - High critical vulnerability mitigation coordination - Cost allocations - Service Management - Continuous Improvement of Vulnerability Managemenet Service
